name: Catty & Batty 2: The Spirit Guide
description:
Early Access:

This game is current in development! Feedback is greatly appreciated. If you stumble upon a bug, please provide as much detail as possible. You can expect updates every two weeks. Nothing is final just yet, a lot can and probably will change until release.

Controls:

Controller (Playstation / Xbox):

  • Cross / A: Build Box / Confirm
  • Circle / B: Remove box / Cancel
  • Left Stick: Move
  • Square / X: Start spirits
  • Start: Open Pause Menu
  • R1 / RB: Switch characters
  • L1 / LB: Switch cursor style
  • Triangle / Y: Preview spirit path

Keyboard (Player 1):

  • Enter / Left Ctrl: Build Box / Confirm
  • X: Remove box / Cancel
  • WASD: Move
  • V: Start spirits
  • Escape: Open Pause Menu
  • B: Switch characters
  • N: Switch cursor style
  • C: Preview spirit path

Keyboard (Player 2):

  • NumPad Enter / NumPad 0: Build Box / Confirm
  • NumPad 1 / NumPad Period: Remove box / Cancel
  • NumPad Arrows: Move
  • NumPad 5: Start spirits
  • NumPad Plus: Open Pause Menu
  • NumPad 9: Switch characters
  • NumPad 7: Switch cursor style
  • NumPad 3: Preview spirit path

Mouse (Player 1):

  • Left click: Build box / Confirm
  • Right click: Remove box / Cancel
  • Middle click: Start spirits
